body_html: @ebrevdo : In my opinion there should be something more general. For cases in which one trains a RNN with the whole sequence being fed at once but during inference requires fetching and feeding the states on a per time-step basis, the solution right now is not very neat. Is there some hope of fetching and feeding list of state tuples for MultiRNNCell in some way.
